mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carts(user_id, product_id, quantity, option_a, option_b, option_c, option_d, option_e) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity},#{optionA},#{optionB},#{optionC},#{optionD},#{optionE})
mapper.update: UPDATE carts SET quantity=#{quantity}, option_a=#{optionA},option_b=#{optionB},option_c=#{optionC},option_d=#{optionD},option_e=#{optionE} WHERE cart_id=#{cartId}
UPDATE carts SET quantity = #{quantity} WHERE cart_id = #{cartId}
